org.spongepowered.api.service

Interface ServiceReference<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the reference

    public interface ServiceReference<T>
    A reference to a service that may or may not be currently registered, but will be updated if a registration does happen.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T await()
      Block until the service is available.
      void executeWhenPresent(com.google.common.base.Predicate<T> run)
      Queue a command to be executed after a service is registered.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<T> ref()
      Get the reference to the current state of this service.

    • Method Detail

      • ref

        com.google.common.base.Optional<T> ref()
        Get the reference to the current state of this service.
        Returns:
        reference to the latest value of the service -- may not be present

      • await

        T await()
 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Block until the service is available. Bad idea to run this on the main thread.
        Returns:
        The service if available
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if waiting is interrupted

      • executeWhenPresent

        void executeWhenPresent(com.google.common.base.Predicate<T> run)
        Queue a command to be executed after a service is registered. If the service is already registered, this function will be run immediately from the current thread.

        If the service has not yet been registered, this function is called from the thread the service is registered on after registration occurs. The return value of the function is ignored.

        Parameters:
        run - The function to execute
